name: Gulf Island Fabrication, Inc.
description: Gulf Island Fabrication, Inc. is a leading provider of fabrication and engineering services for the energy and industrial sectors. Founded in 1985 and headquartered in Houma, Louisiana, the company specializes in the construction of complex offshore and onshore facilities, including platforms, modules, and subsea systems. Gulf Island's extensive capabilities encompass the fabrication of steel structures, marine vessels, and specialized equipment for the oil and gas industry, as well as renewable energy projects such as wind and solar. The company is committed to delivering high-quality products and services while maintaining the highest standards of safety and environmental stewardship. Gulf Island’s diversified portfolio serves a broad range of clients, from major oil companies to government entities, and its experienced workforce is dedicated to meeting the unique requirements of each project. With a focus on innovation and efficiency, Gulf Island aims to enhance its service offerings and expand its market presence in the evolving energy landscape.
ceo: Kurt M. H. B. S. W. H. H. B. S. W. H. H. B. S. W. H. H. B. S. W. H. H. B. S. W. H.
